mapper.select: select types.*, count(*) count from blog_tag join blogs on blog_tag.blog_id=blogs.blog_id join types on blog_tag.tag_id=types.type_tag_id group by blog_tag.tag_id order by type_tag_level asc,COUNT(*) desc
select type_tag_id, type_tag_name, type_parent_id, type_tag_level from types
select type_tag_id, type_tag_name, type_parent_id, type_tag_level from types order by type_tag_level asc,type_tag_id desc limit #{page}, #{size}

select types.type_tag_id, types.type_tag_name, types.type_tag_level from blog_tag join blogs on blog_tag.blog_id=blogs.blog_id join types on blog_tag.tag_id=types.type_tag_id where blog_tag.blog_id = #{id} and types.type_tag_level = 1

select blogs.blog_id, blogs.blog_title, blogs.blog_description, blogs.blog_first_img, blogs.blog_update_time, blogs.blog_views from blog_tag join blogs on blog_tag.blog_id=blogs.blog_id join types on blog_tag.tag_id=types.type_tag_id where types.type_tag_id = #{id}
